Download Kelivo ‚Äã

Get Kelivo on your device - available for Android, iOS, and HarmonyOS.

üì± iOS ‚Äã

App Store (Recommended) ‚Äã

Stable releases for iPhone and iPad.

Requirements: iOS 14.0 or later

Installation:

  1. Tap the App Store badge above
  2. Tap "Get" or price button
  3. Authenticate with Face ID/Touch ID/password
  4. App will download and install automatically

TestFlight (Beta) ‚Äã

Early access to new features and updates.

Join Beta: https://testflight.apple.com/join/PZZyRMyY

Requirements: TestFlight app installed, iOS 14.0+

Installation:

  1. Install TestFlight from App Store if you don't have it
  2. Open the beta link on your iOS device
  3. Tap "Accept" to join
  4. Tap "Install" in TestFlight

Note: Beta builds may have bugs. Report issues on GitHub.

ü§ñ Android ‚Äã

APK Download ‚Äã

Direct download from GitHub Releases.

Latest Release: https://github.com/Chevey339/kelivo/releases/latest

Requirements: Android 8.0 (API 26) or later

Installation Steps:

  1. Download the APK

    • Visit the releases page on your Android device
    • Tap the latest .apk file to download

  2. Enable Unknown Sources (if needed)

    • Go to Settings ‚Üí Security
    • Enable Install unknown apps for your browser
    • Or enable Unknown sources (older Android)

  3. Install the APK

    • Open your downloads or tap the notification
    • Tap the APK file
    • Tap Install
    • Tap Open when complete

Troubleshooting:

  • Can't install: Check Android version (need 8.0+)
  • Security warning: This is normal for apps outside Play Store
  • Installation blocked: Enable unknown sources in settings

Note: Google Play Store release is planned for future.

üåê HarmonyOS / OpenHarmony ‚Äã

Download ‚Äã

Available for HarmonyOS devices.

Latest Release: https://github.com/Chevey339/kelivo-ohos/releases/latest

Requirements: HarmonyOS 2.0 or later

Installation:

  1. Download the package

    • Visit releases page on your device
    • Download .hap or .app file for your device

  2. Install

    • Open the downloaded file
    • Follow HarmonyOS installation prompts
    • Grant necessary permissions

Note: AppGallery release status TBD.

üíª Desktop ‚Äã

Status: Not currently supported

Planned platforms:

  • Windows
  • macOS
  • Linux

Interest: Star the repo or comment on this issue to show interest in desktop support.

Version Information ‚Äã

Current Stable Version ‚Äã

Check the latest release for version number and changelog.

Release Channels ‚Äã

Stable (App Store / Latest Release):

  • Thoroughly tested
  • Recommended for most users
  • Regular updates (monthly/bi-monthly)

Beta (TestFlight / Pre-release):

  • Early access to features
  • More frequent updates
  • May have bugs
  • Help test and provide feedback

Changelog ‚Äã

View detailed changes in each version on the releases page.

After Installation ‚Äã

First Launch ‚Äã

  1. Open Kelivo from your home screen or app drawer
  2. Grant permissions when prompted (camera, photos, etc.)
  3. Choose language and theme in settings
  4. Add an AI provider to start chatting

Quick Setup ‚Äã

Follow the Quick Start guide to:

  • Add your first AI provider (OpenAI, Google, Anthropic)
  • Create an assistant
  • Start your first conversation

Need Help? ‚Äã

  • Documentation: Browse other sections
  • FAQ: Common questions answered
  • Issues: Report bugs or request features on GitHub

System Requirements ‚Äã

iOS ‚Äã

  • OS: iOS 14.0 or later
  • Devices: iPhone 6s or newer, iPad (5th generation) or newer, iPad mini 4 or newer, iPad Pro
  • Storage: ~50MB free space
  • Internet: Required for AI provider connections

Android ‚Äã

  • OS: Android 8.0 (API 26) or later
  • Architecture: ARM, ARM64, x86, x86_64
  • Storage: ~30-50MB free space
  • Internet: Required for AI provider connections

HarmonyOS ‚Äã

  • OS: HarmonyOS 2.0 or later
  • Storage: ~40MB free space
  • Internet: Required for AI provider connections

Privacy & Security ‚Äã

  • No telemetry: Kelivo doesn't collect usage data
  • Local storage: Your data stays on your device
  • Secure: API keys stored in encrypted device storage
  • Open source: Code available for review

See the Privacy Policy for details.

Update Instructions ‚Äã

iOS (App Store) ‚Äã

Updates install automatically if auto-update is enabled.

Manual update:

  1. Open App Store
  2. Tap your profile icon
  3. Scroll to Available Updates
  4. Tap Update next to Kelivo

iOS (TestFlight) ‚Äã

TestFlight notifies you of new beta builds.

Manual check:

  1. Open TestFlight
  2. Tap Kelivo
  3. Tap Install if update available

Android (APK) ‚Äã

No automatic updates. Check for new releases periodically.

Update process:

  1. Visit releases page
  2. Download new APK
  3. Install over existing app (data is preserved)

Tip: Enable notifications on the GitHub repo to get release alerts.

HarmonyOS ‚Äã

Check the releases page for updates and install manually.

Uninstallation ‚Äã

iOS ‚Äã

  1. Long-press the Kelivo icon on home screen
  2. Tap Remove App
  3. Select Delete App

Or via Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí iPhone Storage ‚Üí Kelivo ‚Üí Delete App

Android ‚Äã

  1. Settings ‚Üí Apps
  2. Find Kelivo
  3. Tap Uninstall

Or long-press app icon ‚Üí App info ‚Üí Uninstall

HarmonyOS ‚Äã

Follow standard HarmonyOS app removal process.

Note: Uninstalling removes all local data (chats, settings, API keys). Export data first if needed.

Frequently Asked Questions ‚Äã

Is Kelivo free? ‚Äã

Yes, the app is free and open-source. You'll need API keys from AI providers, which may have their own costs.

Why isn't Kelivo on Google Play Store? ‚Äã

Play Store release is planned but not yet available. For now, download the APK directly.

Is it safe to install APKs? ‚Äã

Yes, when from official sources. Always download from the official GitHub repository.

How do I know if an update is available? ‚Äã

  • iOS App Store: Check for updates in App Store
  • Android: Watch the GitHub releases page or enable notifications
  • TestFlight: Automatic notifications

Can I install on multiple devices? ‚Äã

Yes! Install on all your devices and use export/import to transfer data between them.

What if I have installation issues? ‚Äã

Check the FAQ or open an issue with:

  • Device model
  • OS version
  • Error message or screenshot
  • Steps you tried
